V.iii.1.D.1.f
.
Active Osteomyelitis Associated With Noncompensable Amputation
When the evaluation for amputation of an extremity or body part affected by osteomyelitis would beÂ zero percent, assign a 10-percent evaluation if there is active osteomyelitis.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Osteomyelitis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
